DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of 7-day-repeated doses of FYU-981 administered orally to healthy male adults once daily. Participants are randomized to placebo (n=3) or FYU-981 (n=6) in each step. After follow-up examination in the step of lower dose, the next dose is administered.
DOC.brief_title: Repeated Dose Phase I Study of FYU-981
DOC.criteria: Japanese healthy adult subjects Body mass index: >=18.5 and <25.0 Subjects with any disease or any history of diseases that might be unsuitable for participation in the clinical study
